recommendations: Md. Mozammil Rana ‚ÄúZoeb is an extremely diligent and innovative manager. Who would go the extra mile to guide us and enable us to work on the fund's operational activities. He would inform us of the various technical and fundamental aspects of the VC landscape. Zoeb coordinated with the Founders of the portfolio companies with intelligence, calm and confidence. Also, he was more than eager to push us to work with the fellow companies‚Äô Founders to be able to help solve their problems and provide us with a hands-on experience of working with entrepreneurs. If fate may allow, I would love to work with this consummate professional at any firm, let alone at Sauce Venture Capital.‚Äù

Arnav Mukherjee ‚ÄúI got a chance to work with Zoeb Ali Khan, during the making of a feature film called Khwaabb. Zoeb, went way beyond the garb of an intern and became extremely effective during his 2 schedule stint. He multi tasked in several departments in our small crew setup and often became the "GO TO MAN" during many situations. A positive thinker,ambitious, zealous and professional, Zoeb truly is an asset for any company he is associated with.‚Äù
